title: Did Trump say that this was a great day for George Floyd?
subtitle: The President ' s comments came during a press conference on employment statistics on June 5, 2020.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: On June 5, 2020, United States President Donald Trump, speaking of employment figures, declared that it was a "great day" for George Floyd, the black man who was killed on May 25 after a Minneapolis police officer kneeled on his neck.
